log:
**Highlights**
ğŸ“¦ Some experimental features are now available through built-in experimental datapacks
ğŸ§¥ Added new default skins for offline players
ğŸ‘» The Vex now has a new look
ğŸ¦´ In the Nether dimension Endermen, Skeletons and Wither Skeletons now only spawn at light level 7 and below (instead of 11 and below)
ğŸ’¡ Numerous changes to Creative Inventory ordering & contents
ğŸ¥š Added new Spawn Egg items for Ender Dragon, Iron Golem, Snow Golem and Wither mobs to Creative mode
ğŸ“© Added Draft Player Reports
ğŸœï¸ Added new `fillbiome` command & sub-commands `execute if|unless biome`
âš™ï¸ Added new Telemetry Events
ğŸ“œ New gamerules: `blockExplosionDropDecay, mobExplosionDropDecay, tntExplosionDropDecay, snowAccumulationHeight, waterSourceConversion, lavaSourceConversion, globalSoundEvents`

**Experimental Features**
ğŸª Added Camels
ğŸ Added new bamboo wood set
ğŸ“š Added Chiseled Bookshelves
ğŸ’° Added Bundles
ğŸ“ Added Hanging Signs
ğŸµ When placing a Mob Head on a Note Block, that Note Block will now play one of the ambient sounds of that mob when played by a player or powered by Redstone
ğŸ½ Added Piglin Heads

**Fixes**
...Too many to list out! Check the changelog for the full list of all changes & fixes.

**Changes**
ğŸï¸ Updated the Create New World screen. Now has three tabs:
- Game-Tab allows to set the world name, Gamemode, Difficultly and whether to allow cheats
- World-Tab allows to set the World-Type and Seed, and to toggle the generation of structures and the bonus chest
- More-Tab provides access to the Game Rules and DataPack Selection Screen
âš™ï¸ Removed the Import Settings button and the corresponding Export Settings button in the Edit World Screen
ğŸ‘• Interacting with armor or elytra items in-hand will now swap them with equipped gear
ğŸ–¥ï¸ Changed how tooltips in the menu UI are positioned so buttons are still readable
âœ¨ Added two new options in the Accessibility menu for adjusting the speed and transparency of enchantment glints
â™¾ï¸ `infinite` is now a valid option for effect durations

**Experimental Features**
ğŸ¥¼ Armor trims can now be applied to leather armor
ğŸ”¹ Armor can now have trims of the same material it is made out of
ğŸ“¦ Adjusted loot table for Smithing Templates
- Dune, Coast, Wild, Sentry Templates will now always generate 2 templates in a chest when found
- Netherite Upgrade smithing templates have been made twice as common
- 1 Eye Armor Trim is now guaranteed in every Stronghold library chest
- Woodland Mansions now have a greatly increased chance of generating the Vex Armor Trim smithing template
- Across the board, smithing templates have been made slightly more common

**Fixes**
ğŸ§Ÿâ€â™‚ï¸ Drowned no longer have a different swimming animation
ğŸª Camels and Frogs don't play their walking animations when they are damaged
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The accessibility onboarding screen can not display any language other than English (US)
ğŸ“š Stronghold library loot table has been replaced by stronghold altar loot table
ğŸ¨ Pixels not present in the palettes get erased, not kept

...And more!
title: **Snapshot 23w05a**

log:
**Note**
âš ï¸ Experimental 1.20 worlds created in the previous snapshot (23w07a) can no longer be opened in this version

**Changes**
âœ¨ The enchantment glint for items in the inventory has been made more visible
ğŸ’§ Potions no longer have an enchantment glint due to it obscuring the color of the potion contents
â™¿ Added a built-in resource pack that enhances the contrast of UI elements, which can be enabled in the Accessibility Options screen
ğŸ–¥ï¸ The appearance of the tab bar in the Create New World screen has been updated
ğŸ–Œï¸ The Brush crafting recipe now uses a Feather, Copper Ingot and Stick in a vertical line
âš™ï¸ New `execute` sub-command for finding positions on top of a heightmap. Changes the height of the execution position to be on top of the given heightmap
- `execute positioned over <heightmap>`

**Fixes**
â™¥ Axolotls no longer give the Regeneration effect to nearby players after they kill a mob, and do not grant "The Healing Power of Friendship!" advancement
ğŸï¸ Create new world screen appears even when world is created; clicking on button causes freeze or crash
ğŸ´ Camels, horses and mules bounce high into the air when being ridden across water
ğŸª Sitting camels don't stand up and begin following players that are tempting them with their favorite food
ğŸŒ¸ On existing snapshot servers, cherry grove biomes cannot be found with "/locate", nor do they generate
ğŸ“¦ Disabling experimental features on the world creation screen causes pack validation to fail
ğŸ—¯ï¸ Some mobs panic when receiving fall damage
ğŸ”¥ Cherry Logs and Wood can't be used as fuel in furnaces
ğŸ‘®â€â™‚ï¸The server process crashes when making a slime ride a iron golem
ğŸ–Œï¸ Brush Recipe is in the Vanilla datapack, not 1.20

...And more changes & fixes!
title: **1.19.4 Pre-release 1**

log:
**Experimental Changes**
ğŸµ Mob heads can now be placed on top of note blocks without sneaking

**Changes**
ğŸ‘» Vexes now use a separate charging animation when empty-handed
ğŸ¥¼ Armor Stands now preserve custom names when placed and broken

ğŸ¦˜ Auto-Jump is now off by default
âŒ¨ï¸ Added arrow key navigation. Menu screens can now be navigated by using the arrow keys. When navigating with arrow keys, sliders need to be activated by pressing Enter or Space to start changing the value

âš™ï¸ The data pack version is now 11
ğŸ—ºï¸ The `clone` command now supports cloning to and from different dimensions. New syntax: `clone [from <sourceDimension>] <begin> <end> [to <targetDimension>] <destination> ...`
ğŸ´ New command to allow entities to start or stop riding other entities - `ride <target> mount <vehicle>` / `ride <target> dismount`
ğŸ”§ Added new gamerule `commandModificationBlockLimit`, controlling the maximum number of blocks changed in one execution of `clone`, `fill` and `fillbiome`

**Fixes**
âš”ï¸ Damage wobble no longer shows direction of incoming damage
â¹ï¸ Multiple buttons can be selected by pressing another button and Tab
ğŸ‘ï¸ The spectate command does not work between dimensions
ğŸ›’ Minecart with hopper not picking matching items from a mixed pile

...And many more technical changes & fixes!

title: **1.19.4 Pre-release 2**

log:
**Experimental Features**
ğŸ¦„ Added Sniffer mob and Torchflower
- Sniffers cannot be tempted or tamed, are passive friendly mobs, sniff in the air and occasionally dig for seeds
- Torchflower seed can be planted on farmland and grows into a flower, and can be used to breed Sniffers. The full-grown flower can be harvested, replanted, and crafted into a dye
âš’ï¸ Added Archeology, Pottery Shards, Suspicious Sand, the Brush item, and Decorated Pots
- Suspicious Sand can be found in Desert Temples and Desert Wells, and can be brushed
- Decorated Pots can be crafted with four Pottery Shards. Can replace either side with Brick to create Decorated Pots with no pictures
ğŸŒ¸ Added Cherry Grove biome, new Cherry wood set and Pink Petals block
- You can find the new biome in the mountains, like Meadows

**Changes**
ğŸ› ï¸ The Crafting Table recipe is unlocked immediately on creating a new world
ğŸµ While playing a music disc, the Jukebox will emit a redstone signal of 15; Droppers and hoppers can now interact with Jukeboxes
â™¥ï¸ When breeding horses and the like, the babies' speed, jump height and health are no longer biased toward the average
âš™ï¸ Added Interaction Entities, new types of entities that records attacks ("left clicks") and interactions ("right clicks")

**Fixes**
ğŸ¦ Allays sometimes have a several-second delay before deciding to follow the player
ğŸ‡ Player is kicked from a server for flying in death screen when dying on a Horse or Camel
ğŸ’¥ The game crashes when navigating with arrow keys after changing key binds
ğŸ´ Players cannot dismount when riding `item_display`, `block_display` and `text_display` using the ride command
âœï¸ Z-fighting on the text of text displays
âœ¨ Resource Pack won't load if it contains reference to non-existing particles

...And many more!
title: **Snapshot 23w07a**

log:
**Features & Changes**
ğŸµ Jukeboxes now emit a note particle above them while playing a music disc to match Bedrock
â™¿ Added a new option in the Accessibility menu called Damage Tilt for controlling the amount of camera shake when being hurt
ğŸï¸ Updated Create New World Screen
- Tabs can be switched with the keyboard by pressing Ctrl+Tab and Ctrl+Shift+Tab
- Specific tabs can also be navigated to by pressing Ctrl+Tab Number
- Added a screen to easily toggle experimental features
ğŸ–¼ï¸ Added painting variants to creative menu
âš™ï¸ Three new entities have been added for flexible display of items, blocks and text
ğŸ¤º Added new command to apply damage to entities. 
- `/damage <target> <amount> [<damageType>] [at <location>]`
- `/damage <target> <amount> [<damageType>] [by <entity>] [from <cause>]`
ğŸ—œï¸ Added new `execute` sub-command for summoning new entity and binding context (`@s`) to it
- `execute summon <entity id>`
ğŸŒ³ Added `doVinesSpread` game rule, determining if vines will spread to nearby blocks

**Fixes**
ğŸ“³ Numerous fixes regarding Skulk Sensors not activated upon some entity activities & player interactions
ğŸ¦ The Warden does not deal the same amount of damage to the player and entities in difficult mode
ğŸ· Opening a Minecart with Hopper provokes Piglins, even though opening a Hopper doesn't provoke them
ğŸ‘– Z-fighting can be seen on leggings and boots worn by entities
âš™ï¸ The execute on owner sub-command does not select the owner of a horse, donkey, llama, or mule
ğŸ Using `/ride` on an entity in another dimension causes client/server desync
ğŸ–¥ï¸ `/execute if loaded <pos>` alone always fails
ğŸ–‹ï¸ In some languages, text is too long and escapes buttons
ğŸ›¡ï¸ Blocking attacks with shields causes the damage tilt to play and red damage tint to show

...And many more technical changes and fixes!
title: **Snapshot 23w06a**

log:
**Experimental Features**
ğŸ¨ Added a new armor trimming system to visually customize your armor
 ğŸ“œ Added Smithing Template items
- Used for visually customizing armors
- Different types of Templates can be found in different structures around your Minecraft World
- Use minerals like Redstone, Diamond, Amethyst, etc... to define their color
- Armor cannot have the same material it is made of applied to it as a trim
- There are 11 types of Smithing Templates & 10 usable minerals for Smithing Templates
- A copy of a Smithing Template can be crafted with 7 diamonds + 1 block of material that the template is made out of + 1 Smithing Template
ğŸ”¨ Redesigned the Smithing Table
- Can now be used for upgrading gears and modifying armors
- Added a required slot for Smithing Templates
âš«ï¸ Changed how Netherite equipment is crafted
- Now requires a Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template, which can be found in Bastion Remnants

**Changes**
ğŸ“˜ Enchantment glint on items and armor is now more subtle
...And many other technical changes!

**Fixes**
ğŸ’¥ Blast Protection does not reduce explosion knockback except at very high levels
ğŸ”ˆ "Narrator: Not Available" isn't grayed out on accessibility splash
ğŸ“¯ All goat horns display as Ponder goat horns and play the Ponder instrument
